text:
The National Security Adviser (RIBADU) who led that high level delegation that came to the U.S. for these meetings, they understand that they are in a rock and a hard place and they gotta make the right decision or President Trump is gonna start making some decisions, he‚Äôs made that clear. But I do think that this is an opportunity for Nigerians to work with us in coordination and cooperation to end this.‚Äù - Congressman Riley Moore

Basically saying to Nigeria, ‚Äúfinalize the joint coordination due process you‚Äôve already agreed to fast or President Trump will bypass you and do what he has to do. The Congressman keeps saying, it‚Äôll really be a win-win for Nigeria to follow through with this process, and I agree. There might be a little pressure and even subtle threats from terrorist sympathizers back home. But you can‚Äôt back off now - because clearly, if you don‚Äôt do something, the USA isn‚Äôt gonna wait for you - that‚Äôs the meaning of ‚Äòrock and a hard place.‚Äô And America is becoming increasingly impatient with Nigeria right now. 

As far as President Trump is concerned, his mind is already made up and probably set on a day for action. If you don‚Äôt move as fast as he expects you too, you‚Äôll most likely be IRAN-ED. A word, they say, is enough for the wise. 

@RepRileyMoore

text:
I congratulate Mallam Nuhu Ribadu, mni, on the occasion of his birthday today. This is a well-deserved moment to celebrate a man whose career has been marked by courage, discipline, and an unwavering commitment to the security and stability of our nation.

As the National Security Adviser to President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, you continue to play a vital role in shaping Nigeria‚Äôs response to emerging threats and strengthening our national security architecture. Your years of service as a police officer, public servant, and reform-driven leader have earned you respect across the country and beyond.

On behalf of the Government and the good people of Ogun State, I join your family, friends, and colleagues in wishing you good health, renewed strength, and greater success in the years ahead. May your dedication to Nigeria continue to inspire many.

Happy Birthday, Mallam Nuhu Ribadu.

text:
WELL DONE RIBADU üëè WAY TO GO! 

War Sec Hegseth wrapped a hush-hush sit-down at the Pentagon with Nigeria's National Security Advisor Mallam Nuhu Ribadu and his crew.

Included? the defense chief, intel boss, and top cop. 

The agenda? Hammering out the "horrific violence against Christians" that's been ripping through northern Nigeria like wildfire.

Nigeria's scrambling, Tinubu dispatched Ribadu to D.C. pronto, and sources say they're suddenly way more open to U.S. military muscle: joint ops, intel sharing, Africa Command embeds. 

-  Excerpts from Mario Nawfal

text:
President Tinubu Commends NSA Mallam Nuhu Ribadu on His 65th Birthday

President Bola Ahmed Tinubu congratulates Mallam Nuhu Ribadu, the National Security Adviser, on his 65th birthday, which is celebrated on November 21, 2025.

President Tinubu portrays Ribadu as a dedicated reformer with strong principles, a highly skilled security expert, and a unwavering advocate for Nigeria.

President Tinubu commends Ribadu for his remarkable honesty and unwavering dedication to public service, which have made a lasting impact on Nigeria's governance and security bodies.

The president said, "Since we struck a close relationship over 15 years ago, I have come to acknowledge and appreciate Nuhu's honesty, forthrightness and camaraderie.

"As a prominent member of our Renewed Hope Agenda team, I have found Nuhu to be a patriotic, loyal, and candid individual.

"As Nuhu turns 65 today, I fervently pray that Almighty Allah will grant him good health and greater wisdom to continue serving our beloved country.‚Äù

President Tinubu Commends NSA Mallam Nuhu Ribadu on His 65th Birthday
